-- | Connect Reactive and FieldTrip
--   
--   This library connects ''Reactive'' (a functional reactive programming
--   library) and ''FieldTrip'' (a functional 3D library).
--   
--   Project wiki page: <a>http://haskell.org/haskellwiki/project-foo</a>
--   
--   The module documentation pages have links to colorized source code and
--   to wiki pages where you can read and contribute user comments. Enjoy!
--   
--   © 2008 by Conal Elliott; BSD3 license.
@package reactive-fieldtrip
@version 0.0


-- | Test Reactive + FieldTrip
module FTest
main :: IO ()
txt :: Geometry2
accumLB :: a -> (a -> a) -> (UI -> Behavior a)
signFlip :: UI -> Behavior Double
revTxt :: String -> (UI -> Behavior Geometry2)
rotTxt :: Double -> Geometry2
track :: Anim Geometry2
spin :: Anim Geometry3
torusPair :: Geometry3
reverseVel :: (UI -> Event a) -> (UI -> Behavior Double)
plasmat :: Col -> Filter3
spinningG :: Geometry3 -> Anim Geometry3
spinning :: Anim (Transform3 Double)
view :: Filter3
type Anim a = UI -> Behavior a
animate :: Sink a -> Sink (Anim a)
anim2 :: Sink (Anim Geometry2)
anim3 :: Sink (Anim Geometry3)
